SAFECRIME_W26.question_text: How safe, if at all, would you say your local community is from crime? Would you say it is

MC_options: We live in a safer world
We live in a more dangerous world
The world we live in is neither safer nor more dangerous
WORLDDANGER_W26.question_text: Compared to 50 years ago, do you think

WORRYG_W26.question_text: How much, if at all, do you worry about the following happening to you? Having a personal health crisis

GUN_W26.question_text: Do you personally own any guns (not including air guns, such as paintball, BB or pellet guns)?

MC_options: someone else in my household owns a gun
no one else in my household owns a gun
GUN1_W26.question_text: Does anyone else in your household own any guns (not including air guns, such as paintball, BB or pellet guns)?

MC_options: I have never fired a gun
EVERSHOT_W26.question_text: Regardless of whether or not you own a gun, have you ever fired a gun?

GUNSOCIETY_W26.question_text: Do you feel that society in general tends to look at most gun owners in a positive way or a negative way?

GUNCOMMUNITY_W26.question_text: Do you feel that people in your local community tend to look at most gun owners in a positive way or a negative way?

GUNCOURSES_W26.question_text: Have you ever taken any gun safety courses such as weapons training, hunter safety or firearm safety?

GUNCONTRIBA_W26.question_text: How much, if at all, do you think the ease with which people can legally obtain guns contributes to gun violence in the country today?

GUNCONTRIBB_W26.question_text: How much, if at all, do you think the ease with which people can illegally obtain guns contributes to gun violence in the country today?

GROWUPVIOL_W26.question_text: How much of a problem was gun violence in the community where you spent the majority of time when you were growing up?

MC_options: there were guns in my household
there were no guns in my household
I am not sure if there were guns in my household
GROWUPGUN1_W26.question_text: Thinking about when you were growing up, as far as you know, were there ever any guns in your household or not?

GROWUPGUN7_W26.question_text: How often, if ever, did you use air guns, such as paintball, BB or pellet guns when you were growing up?

DEFENDGUN_W26.question_text: Not including in military combat or as part of your job, have you ever used a gun to defend yourself, your family or possessions, either by firing it or threatening to fire it?

GUNTHREAT_W26.question_text: Has anyone ever used a gun to threaten or intimidate you or someone in your family?

CRIMEVICTIM_W26.question_text: Have you ever been a victim of a violent crime, whether a gun was used or not?

GUNACTIVITYA_W26.question_text: How often, if ever, do you visit websites about guns, hunting or other shooting sports

GUNACTIVITYB_W26.question_text: How often, if ever, do you watch TV programs about guns or watch gun-oriented videos

GUNACTIVITYC_W26.question_text: How often, if ever, do you listen to gun-oriented podcasts or radio shows

GUNACTIVITYD_W26.question_text: How often, if ever, do you participate in online discussion forums about guns

GUNACTIVITYE_W26.question_text: How often, if ever, do you attend gun shows
